title: Get Fresh Down n Dirty Foot Scrub For Foot Care 170g
features: Foot Scrub exfoliates and soothes dry scaly feet
description: New botanical-based lemongrass get fresh feet products slough, buff and moisturize providing instant relief for tattered tootsies. formulated without parabens, synthetic dyes and sodium laurel/Lauretha sulfates. get fresh down 'n dirty is a heavy-duty pumice foot scrub that delivers results. loaded with pumice, walnut shells, moisturizing seaweed and aloe Vera, our scrub exfoliates and soothes dry, scaly feet. net weight: 161 g/5.7 oz.
